ai-patthana8.12:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana8.12:1.1_0: Not contentment is a cause of contentment.
ai-patthana8.12:1.1_2: Doing the teaching leads to contentment, not for the sake of material things.
ai-patthana8.12:2.1_0: Not wearing the whole world, the reason for its gods.
ai-patthana8.12:4.1_0: (These five discourses should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
